snippet: With natural gas cheap and incentives lacking, energy sources like wind and solar power have lost the support they had in recent years. Still, projects continue to move forward.
abstract: Plummeting natural gas prices have diminished public support and federal funding for alternative energies like wind and solar power, but a number of projects continue to move forward.
lead_paragraph: With natural gas cheap and incentives lacking, energy sources like wind and solar power have lost the support they had in recent years. Still, projects continue to move forward.

headline.seo: Renewable Energy Advances in the U.S. Despite Obstacles
headline.main: Renewable Sources of Power Survive, but in a Patchwork
headline.print_headline: Renewable Sources Of Power Survive, But in a Patchwork
